fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sacrifice a random Townie to haunt a random suspicious player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Suspicion follows sheriff results, you are fooled by frames and detection immunity.
- Sacrificing a Townie deals an Overkill attack to them and deals an Unstoppable attack to the evil target.
- You may choose to sacrifice yourself instead of a random Townie.
- You can keep a last will due to your practices being fully automatic.
